mutants.mutated_line: count = sum((2 for weight in weights if weight >= N / 2))
mutants.code:
def count_heavy_bags(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, weights) = case
        count = sum((2 for weight in weights if weight >= N / 2))
        results.append(count)
    return results
